summary: The implementation successfully delivers all core requirements for the Veebirstays property website. The landing page displays the property name, includes a photo gallery/carousel, shows property details, features an amenities section with icons, and provides a booking CTA linking to the Airbnb listing. The design implements the requested warm, earthy color palette (terracotta, warm white, sage green) with professional typography. All acceptance criteria are met with responsive layouts for mobile and desktop. No missing requirements or hallucinated features detected.

hallucinated_features.description: Social media links (Facebook, Instagram, X/Twitter) in the footer
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested social media integration or links to social platforms. The footer includes placeholder social media icons that were not part of the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional footer sections (Quick Links, Policies) with navigation items like 'About Us', 'House Rules', 'Contact', 'Cancellation Policy', 'Privacy Policy', 'Terms of Service'
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not specify footer navigation sections or policy links. These appear to be standard website elements added beyond the requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking in footer
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement mentioned attribution or tracking for the builder. This is a branding element not requested in the BuildRequest.
